content: Once Fuban starts another charge, he’ll repeat doing several leap attacks in a row that you’ll need to keep avoiding. Luckily, the Yellow Wind Sage will put an end to this by banging the drums more to stun Fuban entirely.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fuban.md', within the main section titled 'Fuban', specifically from the subsection 'Fuban Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once Fuban starts another charge, he’ll repeat doing several leap attacks in a row that you’ll need to keep avoiding. Luckily, the Yellow Wind Sage will put an end to this by banging the drums more to stun Fuban entirely.
